alert.note: Alert for Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Lower Snake River Plain; Upper Snake River Plain (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 5:57PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...Gusty thunderstorm outflow winds will impact portions of southwestern Jefferson, east central Butte, northwestern Bonneville and northwestern Bingham Counties through 645 PM MDT... At 554 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking an outflow boundary extending from 10 miles south of Northwest Inl to near Southeast Inl to Taber. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could impact travel along US-20, as well as knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Terreton, Roberts, Mud Lake, Taber, Southeast Inl, Osgood, Kettle Butte, East Butte, and Sage Junction. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Lower Snake River Plain; Upper Snake River Plain
